definition: single-log bridge/(fig.) difficult path
alone/independent/single/sole/only
surname Mu
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
bridge/CL:座[zuo4]
lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom)/fig. you go your way, I'll go mine/you do it your way, I'll do it mine
pinyin: ni3 zou3 ni3 de5 Yang2 guan1 Dao4 , wo3 guo4 wo3 de5 du2 mu4 qiao2
containing_words.word: 你走你的阳关道，我过我的独木桥

sentences.english: You take the open road and I'll cross the log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 你走你的阳光道，我过我的独木桥。

sentences.english: What's the meaning of passing the university entrance exam?
sentences.chinese: 走过“高考”这座独木桥意义何在？

sentences.english: Only firm confidence and untiring efforts is the difficult path leading to victory.
sentences.chinese: 唯有坚定的信心与不懈的努力才是通往胜利的独木桥。

sentences.english: When Baby pig sees his mother in the single-log bridge, he waves his hands happily.
sentences.chinese: 当猪宝宝看到他的妈妈在独木桥上，他高兴地挥手。

sentences.english: The students filed across a narrow foot bridge.
sentences.chinese: 学生们逐一走过独木桥。

sentences.english: Congress has opted for the low road of misdirected currency bashing.
sentences.chinese: 国会已经选择了一条打击货币的独木桥路线。

sentences.english: He was afraid to cross the one-logged bridge because he was afraid of falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 他不敢过这座独木桥，因为他害怕掉进河里。

sentences.english: She teetered over the single-log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 她摇摇晃晃地走过独木桥。

sentences.english: One day, he throws the husk to the single-log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把西瓜皮扔到了独木桥上。

definition: same as 陽關大道|阳关大道[Yang2 guan1 Da4 dao4]
(lit.) the road through Yangguan 陽關|阳关[Yang2 guan1]/(fig.) wide open road/bright future
road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects
to surmount/to cross over

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
rugged/craggy
winding road (twisting and turning like a sheep's intestine)
drawbridge/suspension bridge
the starting line (of a race)/scratch line (in a relay race)
potholed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes
the road back to where one came from
minor road/lane/pathway/trail
avenue/CL:條|条[tiao2]
bon voyage/Godspeed
to climb over/to get over (difficulties)/to scale/to surmount
